markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Miracle Worker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5801) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once every 10 minutes

</column>

---

Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain. You can administer a [major or true elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3308) to a creature who has been dead for no more than 2 rounds. When you do, that creature is immediately returned to life with 1 Hit Point and becomes [wounded 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=99).
name: Miracle Worker

When you do, that creature is immediately returned to life with 1 Hit Point and becomes wounded 1.
